description: An illustration of a disposable plastic cup of strawberry yogurt; the flavor of the yogurt can be inferred by the illustration of a strawberry on the front of the cup. A spoon rests in the cup of yogurt, with the handle sticking out on the right side; the tin foil lid of the cup has been partially peeled back toward the left. The top of the tin foil lid is various shades of pink and the underside is various shades of gray. The yogurt cup is mostly white with a pink label and a gray semi-circle and an illustration of a strawberry on the front.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
